Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

2 Zuchinnis and wash
3 Crimini Mushrooms and wash
2 Garlic Cloves
Parmessan Cheese
2 Vegetable Oils
Spirilizer
Black Pepper
Spaghetti Sauce

Recipe

Put 2 Seconds Vegetable Oils in pantelligent on 4
Chop 2 Garlic Cloves
Wait 5 seconds for pan to be hot
Put in 3 Crimini Mushrooms and Garlic Clove
Wait 3 minutes for vegetables to be cooked
Spirilizer 2 Zuchinnis
Put zuchinni in pan
Wait 5 minutes for zuchinni to be cooked
Put in Spaghetti Sauce
Turn heat to 5
Wait 5 minutes to be done with the recipe
Season with Black Pepper
Top with Measuring Cup Parmessan Cheese
